title: Supporter Says Woodfox Is 'Very Cautious' When It Comes To Judicial System
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish talks to Angela Allen-Bell, a professor at the Southern University Law Center. She got to know and became an advocate for Albert Woodfox during her work on solitary confinement.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
